title: Acclaimed Egyptian novelist Gamal el-Ghitani dies at 70
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
Egypt's state-run news agency says Gamal el-Ghitani, one of Egypt's most acclaimed novelists, has died at the age of 70. â€¦ Click to Contin...
